meanings.definition: A book used as a standard work for the study of a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: In school, students carry heavy textbooks in their backpacks.
meanings.sent2: She bought all the textbooks she needed for her biology class.
meanings.sent3: The textbooks on astronomy made the stars seem closer.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library, with textbooks lining the shelves of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The textbooks were like treasure maps leading to understanding.

meanings.definition: A book containing a collection of texts for study.
meanings.sent1: The history textbooks in the library covered different time periods.
meanings.sent2: He borrowed a stack of textbooks from the university library.
meanings.sent3: The textbooks on ancient civilizations were like time machines.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like textbooks, each page holding a new story.
meanings.sent5: The textbooks whispered secrets of the past to eager readers.
